architectural_notes: Use relative path for prompt data source: set DATA_URL to '/data.json' instead of hardcoded 'https://viralprompts.in/data.json'.

existing_features.title: Update the frontend data source constant so the app uses the local path for the prompts JSON: change `const DATA_URL = 'https://viralprompts.in/data.json';` to `const DATA_URL = '/data.json';` in `frontend/src/services/viralPromptsClient.ts`.

projectName: Use local /data.json for prompt data URL
